title: manifest.xml files that are not ROS manifests in atlas_description confuse ROS tools

content.raw:
It appears after an earlier cleanup (#130) there are now again manifest.xml files in the ROS_PACKAGE_PATH by default, resulting in a lot of warnings being generated by some ROS tools. This is some of the output of rqt_gui when starting it:

```
#!

Could not parse manifest "/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/environments/drc_terrain/manifest.xml":
manifest [/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/environments/drc_terrain/manifest.xml] must have a single 'package' element
Could not parse manifest "/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/environments/standpipe/manifest.xml":
manifest [/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/environments/standpipe/manifest.xml] must have a single 'package' element
Could not parse manifest "/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/environments/fire_hose/manifest.xml":
manifest [/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/environments/fire_hose/manifest.xml] must have a single 'package' element
Could not parse manifest "/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/atlas_description/atlas_cpu_lidar/manifest.xml":
manifest [/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/atlas_description/atlas_cpu_lidar/manifest.xml] must have a single 'package' element
Could not parse manifest "/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/atlas_description/atlas_sandia_hands_stumps_cpu_lidar/manifest.xml":
manifest [/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/atlas_description/atlas_sandia_hands_stumps_cpu_lidar/manifest.xml] must have a single 'package' element
Could not parse manifest "/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/atlas_description/atlas_irobot_hands/manifest.xml":
manifest [/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/atlas_description/atlas_irobot_hands/manifest.xml] must have a single 'package' element
Could not parse manifest "/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/environments/drc_vehicle/manifest.xml":
manifest [/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/environments/drc_vehicle/manifest.xml] must have a single 'package' element
Could not parse manifest "/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/atlas_description/atlas/manifest.xml":
manifest [/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/atlas_description/atlas/manifest.xml] must have a single 'package' element
Could not parse manifest "/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/environments/golf_cart/manifest.xml":
manifest [/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/environments/golf_cart/manifest.xml] must have a single 'package' element
Could not parse manifest "/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/environments/powerplant/manifest.xml":
manifest [/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/environments/powerplant/manifest.xml] must have a single 'package' element
Could not parse manifest "/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/irobot_hand_description/irobot_hand_on_box/manifest.xml":
manifest [/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/irobot_hand_description/irobot_hand_on_box/manifest.xml] must have a single 'package' element
Could not parse manifest "/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/atlas_description/atlas_sandia_hands/manifest.xml":
manifest [/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/atlas_description/atlas_sandia_hands/manifest.xml] must have a single 'package' element
Could not parse manifest "/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/atlas_description/atlas_sandia_hands_cpu_lidar/manifest.xml":
manifest [/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/atlas_description/atlas_sandia_hands_cpu_lidar/manifest.xml] must have a single 'package' element
Could not parse manifest "/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/irobot_hand_description/irobot_hand_description/manifest.xml":
manifest [/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/irobot_hand_description/irobot_hand_description/manifest.xml] must have a single 'package' element
Could not parse manifest "/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/atlas_description/atlas_sandia_hands_stumps/manifest.xml":
manifest [/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/atlas_description/atlas_sandia_hands_stumps/manifest.xml] must have a single 'package' element
```

This kind of spam in the terminal  clearly is undesirable, so it would be nice if this problem gets resolved.

Could not parse manifest "/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/environments/drc_terrain/manifest.xml":
